translations.chinese: 略南陽郡，南陽守走，保城守宛。
translations.english: They seized Nanyang commandery. The Nanyang governor fled and defended the city of Wan.
Pei Gong led his troops west past Wan.

translations.chinese: 張良諫曰：「沛公雖欲急入關，秦兵尚眾，距險。
translations.english: Zhang Liang advised: "Although Pei Gong wishes to rush into the passes, the Qin troops are still numerous and hold the dangerous passes.

translations.chinese: 今不下宛，宛從 後擊，彊秦在前，此危道也。」
translations.english: If we do not take Wan now, Wan will attack from behind while the strong Qin face us ahead. This is a dangerous path."

translations.chinese: 於是沛公乃夜引軍從他道還，偃旗幟，遲明，圍宛城三匝。
translations.english: So Pei Gong led his army back by another route at night, hid his banners, and at dawn surrounded Wan city three times.
